juzs.text: Xas Nekwni Nessers asen d lmalayek, u mmeslayen asen d lmeggtin, u Nefser asen d, yal cci, zdat sen, ur ppamnen, siwa ma ihwa yaS i Oebbi. Maca, aias degsen ur ssinen
Akka ay Nerra, i yal nnbi, acengu. Ccwaien, seg imdanen akw si leonun, ppemweeein garasen awal uziyn i u$uoou. Lemmer i S ihwi, i Mass ik, ur p xeddmen. Ihi, eoo iten ar wayen d snulfuyen
iwakken ad mmalen $uoes ulawen n wid ur numin s laxeot, a t oavin, ad gemren ayen zeraen
Day b$i$ ameaddi, war Oebbi? D Neppa i wen d Issersen Tazmamt, s ussefhem. Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, eoan, ar neppat, ters ed s$uo Mass ik, s tidep. Ur ppili seg wid ipcukkun
Awal n Mass ik ibbwev, s tidep akked lmizan. Ur illi ubeddel deg wawal iS. Neppa Issel, d Amusnaw
Ma tu$ev awal i tegwti n wid illan di tmurt, a k telfen seg ubrid n Oebbi. Teddun kan d wayen nwan. Nitni snulfuyen d kan
Ih, Mass ik Issen sennig akw, anwi innetlafen seg ubrid iS. Neppa Issen sennig akw, anwi ipwanhan
Eccet ayen i$ef d immekti isem n Oebbi, ma tumnem s issekniyen iS

Acu ikwen iu$en, ur teppeppem ara seg wayen i$ef d immekti isem n Oebbi? Ni$ Issfehm awen ayen i wen Igdel, siwa ma ipwaeeppem fellawen. Ih, aias ay tellifen, s zzhu nnsen, war tussna. Ni$ Mass ik Iugar akw akken Issen wid izegren tilas
Ekkset abekkav uvhio akked uffir. Ih, wid ibbwin abekkav, ad ppuqeiiin $ef wayen xeddmen
Ur teppet ayen i$ef ur d immekti ara, isem n Oebbi. Ih, ayagi d ixmio. Ih, ccwaien pweeein i imeddukwal nnsen, a kwen namren. Ma tu$em asen awal, kunwi, s tidep, tcurkem
Ma win illan d lmegget, Nessider it id, Nga yas tafat, iteddu yis ger medden, day d amedya s, win illan di tillas, ur izmir ad iffe$ segsent. Akka, ippucebbee i ijehliyen, wayen xeddmen
Akka ay Nerra, ad ppandin di yal tamdint, ibe$wviyen is, uqsieen mavi. Ppandin kan i iman nnsen, ur faqen

Ma iusa ten id ussekni, ad inin: "ur neppamen, alamma iusa ya$ d ayen id iusan ar imazanen n Oebbi". Oebbi Yif akw akken Issen, anida ara Ifk taboap iS. Ad ioxisen, ar Oebbi, wid ibe$wven. Fellasen aaaqeb uqsie, ilmend n wayen ppandin
Win Ib$a Oebbi a t Inhu, ad illi idmaren is ar wannuz. Win Ib$a a t Itlef, ad Irr idmaren is deyqen, teeyyoen, amzun ippaaoav ad iali s igenni. Akka i Ippara Oebbi axerwaa i wid ur numin
Wagi d abrid uwqim n Mass ik. Ni$ Nessefham issekniyen i ugdud ismektayen
I nitni, axxam n tifrat ar Mass nnsen. Neppa d Bab nnsen, $ef wayen xeddmen

Ass ideg ara ten Ifser meooa: "a yagraw n leonun, ni$ tcerraem deg imdanen"? A d inin imawlan nnsen, seg imdanen: "a Mass nne$! Kra segne$ $elten si kra, Nebbwev ar lajel nne$, i $ Terriv". Inna: "d times ay d tanezdu$t nnwen, ad degs twekkoem, siwa ma ur aS ihwi i Oebbi". Ih, Mass ik d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Akka ay Neppara kra imednas d iebiben n kra, ilmend n wayen keppben

A yagraw n leonun d yimdanen, day ur kwen id usan ara imazanen segwen? Mmalen awen issekniyen iW, nedoen kwen $ef temlilit n wass nnwen agi". Nnan d: "ncehhed $ef yiman nne$". T$uoo iten tmeddurt n ddunit. Cehhden $ef yiman nnsen ar nitni, s tidep, llan d ijehliyen
Akka, acku Mass ik ur Isquccu tamdint, s ddens, ma llan imezda$ is d i$wefliyen
I yal yiwen, tiseddarin seg wayen ixdem. Ur I$effel Mass ik $ef wayen xeddmen
Mass ik d Asaay, d Bab ueunu. Ma ihwa yaS a kwen Ikkes, a d Inuef, deffir wen, ayen i S ihwan, akken ikwen id Ixleq si tarwa n ugdud nniven
Ih, ayen i wen ippuaahden, a d ias, war ccekk. Ur tezmirem, kunwi, a ppesfunngem
Ini: "a yagdud iw! Xedmet akken tewaam, nek ad xedme$. Deqqal a ppeeoem iwumi ara telhu taggara n Uxxam". S tidep, ur rebeen imednas

Gan aS i Oebbi amur, seg wayen id Ifka n l$ella, akked lmal. Nnan: "wagi i Oebbi –- di tikta nnsen -, wagi i icriken nne$". Ayen gan i icriken nnsen, ur ippawev ar Oebbi. Ayen gan i Oebbi, neppa, ad yawev ar icriken nnsen. I icmet wayen id peuddun
Akka ay cebbeen icriken nnsen, i waias n yimcurak, timen$iwt n tarwa nnsen, iwakken a ten squccen, u ad irwi ddin nnsen, fellasen. Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, ur p xeddmen. Eoo iten ar wayen d snulfuyen

Nnan: "lmal akked l$ella yagi ppugedlen, ur ten itepp, siwa win i $ ihwan". S tikta nnsen. Lmal iwumi gedlen iarar nnsen, lmal iwumi ur d ppadren fellasen, isem n Oebbi. D asnulfu mgal iS. A ten Iqeiii $ef wayen d snulfuyen
Qqaoen: "ayen illan deg iaabbav n lmal agi, i ddker nne$ kan, ipwagdel i tlawin nne$". Ma ilul ed immut, ad mlilen $uoes. A ten Iqeiii $ef wayen d qqaoen. Neppa, s tidep, d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ni$ xesoen wid in$an arraw nnsen. D tiderwect, war tussna. Gedlen ayen i s iten I$at Oebbi, snulfan d mgal Oebbi. Ni$ nnetlafen, ur pwanhan

D Neppa id Ixelqen leonanat s iaricen, ne$ war iaricen, tizdayin, zerriaa n yal uuenf, i wucci; azemmur akked rreman ippemcabin, ne$ ur neppemcabi. Eccet si ppemoa nnsen, ma fkan d, efket leeqq is, ass u$ellet nnsen. Ur ssugutet. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara wid ipeawalen
Si lmal, aggway d wussu. Eccet seg wayen ikwen Ioeeq Oebbi. Ur teddut d iberdan n Cciian. Neppa, s tidep, d acengu nnwen n uuee
Iamt tyugiwin, snat u$welmi, snat umaiz. Ini: "d sin n ddker i Igdel, ne$ d snat n nnta, ne$ d ayen illan deg iaabbav n snat n nnta? Xebboet iyi d, s tussna, ma tessawalem tidep

Seg ile$wman, snat, seg ubeqoi, snat. Ini: "d sin n ddker i Igdel, ne$ d snat n nnta, ne$ d ayen illan deg iaabbav n snat n nnta, ne$ tellam d inagan mi kwen id Iweuua Oebbi $ef waya"? Anwa idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, iwakken ad itlef imdanen, ur issin. Ih, Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas

Ini: "ur ufi$ ipwagdel a t icc yiwen, deg wayen iyi d ippuweeean, siwa ma illa d loifa, ne$ d idim immaren, ne$ d aksum n yilef - wagi, war ccekk, d lewsex -, ne$ ieegga s d$wel i war Oebbi. Win i$ef ippueeppem, ur ib$i, ur ib$wiv, Mass ik, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

I wudayen, Negdel ayen akw isaan acaren, seg ubeqoi akked u$welmi, Negdel asen tassemt nnsen, siwa tin n iarar nnsen, iaabbav, akked wayen ipwaxelven akked i$san. Akka ay ten Nepkafi, ilmend n iieoo nnsen. Nekwni, war ccekk, d At Tidep
Ma skaddben k, ini: "Mass nnwen d Bab ueunu iwsaan, ur ipwexxio ssexv iS, af ugdud ibe$wviyen

Ad inin imcurak: "lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, nekwni akked imezwura nne$, ur ncurek, ur negdel acemma". Akka ay skaddben imezwura nnsen, armi jeooben ssexv nne£. Ini: "day tesaam tussna ar a$ d tesseknem? Teppeddum kan d nnwaya, kunwi tesnulfuyem d kan
Ini: "n Oebbi timenna tunuiein. Lemmer i S ihwi, yili Inha kwen akw

Ini: "awit ed inagan nnwen, ara icehhden ar Oebbi Igdel ayagi". Ma cehhden, ur cehhed yidsen. Ur teddu d lhawiyya n wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, akked wid ur numin s laxeot, u pparan tanudda i Mass nnsen

Ini: "yyaw, ad ini$. I wen Igdel Mass nnwen: ur aS tepcarakem acemma; elhut ar imawlan nnwen; ur neqqet tarwa nnwen, di tigullelt - d Nekwni ara kwen Ioeeqen yidsen -, ur ppaeet ar laao, d uvhio ne$ d uffir; ur neqqet amdan, d ayen Igdel Oebbi, siwa ma s leeqq". Ar waya i kwen Iweuua, amar a pfehmem

Ur pqeooibet s ayla ugujil, siwa s wayen ilhan, alamma immeetel. Weznet, ktilet s lewqama. Ur Nepkellif amdan siwa ar wayen iwumi izmer. Ma thedoem d, weznet, xas ma $eo llzem nnwen. Qadoet lemaahda n Oebbi. Iweuua kwen $ef waya, amar a d temmektim
D wagi ay d abrid iW uwqim, ddut degs. Ur teddut d iberdan ara kwen isiixoen seg ubrid iS. Iweuua kwen $ef waya, amar a peezzbem
Sinna, Nefka Tazmamt i Musa. Tewqem i wid imaanen, tfeuuel yal cci, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Amar ad amnen s timlilit n Mass nnsen
Tagi d Tazmamt, Nessers ip id, teoqa. Ihi, ddut yides, eezzbet, amar fellawen aeunu
Ur d teqqaoem ara: "ters ed kan Tezmamt $eo sin leoyus, uqbel nne$, ur neeoi d acu sselmaden

Ne$ a d tinim: "lemmer id ters Tazmamt $uone$, yili nif iten akken nepwanha". Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen, s$uo Mass nnwen, d nnhaya u d aeunu. Anwa idensen sennig win iskaddben issekniyen n Oebbi, u iooa iten? A Nqeiii wid iooan issekniyen nne£, s yir aaaqeb, ilmend n wayen la ppaooan

D acu poaoun, siwa ma ten id asent lmalayek, ne$ a d Ias Mass ik, ne$ a d asen kra issekniyen n Mass ik? Ass ideg ara d asen kra issekniyen n Mass ik, ur infaa umdan liman is, ma, iu$ leal, ur iumin ara, ne$ ur iksib lxio, di liman is. Ini: "gganit, nekwni, ih, la nepgani
Ih, wid ibvan ddin nnsen, u gan ikabaren, ur tepkkiv yidsen deg wacemma. Lameo nnsen ar Oebbi kan, sinna, a ten Ixebbeo $ef wayen xeddmen
Win id iusan s yise$, ines mraw i t icban; win id iusan s tucmip, ad ippuqeiii s tin kan i p icban; nitni ur pwadensen
Ini: "nek, Inha iyi Mass iw, ar ubrid uwqim, d ddin n ddwam, win n Iboahim, i imalen ar tidep, ur nelli seg imcurak
Ini: "ih, taeallit iw, iseflan iw, tudert iw, tameppant iw, i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Ur aS illi ucarek. Pwamoe$ d s waya: nek d amdua amenzu

Ini: "day b$i$ mass, war Oebbi? U Neppa d Mass n yal cci". Ur ikesseb yal yiman, siwa mgal is. Ur ipbibbi win ibubben taakkwemt n wayev. Sinna, ar Mass nnwen, tu$alin nnwen. Sinna, a kwen Ixebbeo $ef wayen tellam temgaradem
D Neppa i kwen Irran d igensas di tmurt. Irra, kra segwen, tiseddaoin sennig wiyav, iwakken a kwen Ijeooeb $ef wayen i wen Ifka. Ih, Mass ik Ip$awal deg uaaqeb. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Almu
Tazmamt ters ed $uoek, ur teppili segs lhejna deg idmaren ik, iwakken a pnabiv yis; u d asmekti i lmumnin
Ddut d wayen id irsen $uowen, s$uo Mass nnwen. Ur teddut d imawlan, war Neppa. Drus id tesmektayem
Aceal n temdinin ay Nessenger. Tusa ten id tiyta nne£, deg ives nnsen, ne$ deg uqeggel nnsen
Ti$oi nnsen, mi ten id tusa tiyta nne£, siwa mi d nnan: "ih, nella d imednas
War ccekk, a Nesteqsi wid u$uo id Nuzen, a Nesteqsi imazanen
War ccekk, ad asen Neeku, s tmusni, ur Nelli N$ab
Awzan, assen, d tidep. Wid iwumi eeayet lweznat nnsen, widak d wid irebeen
Wid iwumi fessuset lweznat nnsen, widak d wid ixesoen iman nnsen, seg akken sednasen issekniyen nne£
Ni$, s tidep, Nesrekd ikwen di tmurt, Nerra yawen, degs, tamaict nnwen. Drus ay tesnemmirem
Ni$, s tidep, Nxelq ikwen, sinna, Nmesl ikwen, sinna, Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem"! Knant, siwa Iblis. Ur illi seg wid iknan
Inna: "acu k iiifen ur tekniv ara, mi k d Umoe$"? Inna d: "Nek, ife$ t. Txelqev iyi si tmes, Txelqev t si talaxt
Inna: "ihi, uuub segs! Ur ak ippunefk ara a ppesme$woev iman ik, degs. Effe$, kecc seg wid ixuuen
Inna: "Eoo iyi, ar ass ideg ara d kkren
Inna: "kecc, ih, seg wid ara iqqimen
Inna d: "imi iyi Taammdev a$ewwu, ad asen qqime$, war ccekk, deg ubrid iK uwqim
Sinna, ad asen d tekke$ zdat, deffir, yeffus, zelmev. Ur Teppafev, $eo tugwti segsen, asnemmer
Inna: "effe$ segs, d ameequo ippuvegoen! War ccekk, ad Acaoe$ Loahennama s wid, segsen, i k ivefoen, akked yiswen akw
A Adem, ezde$ Loennet, kecc akked tmeiiut ik, eccet seg wayen i wen ihwan. Ur pqeooibet ttejoa agi, mulac a ppilim seg imednas
I$ewwa ten Cciian, iwakken ad asen d iban aaryan nnsen i illan iffer. Inna: "Ikkes awen, kan, Mass nnwen, ttejoa agi, iwakken ur teppilim d lmalayek, ne$ ur tepwekkioem
Iggul asen: "nek, i kunwi, d unuie

Isdull iten s u$uoou. Mi aaoven si ttejoa nni, walan iman nnsen aaran. Lhan d la pcuddun, $ef iman nnsen, afriwen n Loennet. Issawel asen d Mass nnsen: "day ur awen Gdile$ ara ttejoa nni? Ad awen Ini$: war ccekk, Cciian, i kunwi, d acengu n uuee
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Nvuoo iman nne$. Ma ur a$ Tsemmeev, ur Teunev fella$, a nili seg imexsuoen
Inna: "erset! Kra d icenga n kra. A pzed$em di tmurt, a ppezhum, tallit kan
Irna: "degs a ppidirem, degs a ppemmtem, segs a d teff$em
A tarwa n Adem! Ni$ Nessers awen ed aceiiiv ara kwen issoen, ooeue, akked uceiiiv ueezzeb. Wagi yif iten". Ayagi seg issekniyen n Oebbi, amar a d mmektin

A tarwa n Adem! £uowat a kwen ihewwel Cciian, akken id issuffe$ imezwura nnwen si Loennet! Ikkes asen iceiiiven nnsen, iwakken ad asen issken aaryan nnsen. Neppa, war ccekk, ipwali kwen - neppa akked ccetla s - seg wanda ur ten tepwalim. Ni$ Nerra ccwaien d imawlan n wid ur numin
Mi xedmen ayen n dir, ad inin: "nufa d akka ar imezwura nne$, u Oebbi Iumeo a$ d $uoes. Ini: "Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ippameo ar wayen n dir. Day a d tinim $ef Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Ini: "Iumeo ed Oebbi lmizan. Zzit $uoeS udmawen nnwen di yal lekni, nujet $uoeS. £uoeS, s ddin iufan. Akken ikwen id Ixleq, a ppu$alem
Arbaa Inha it, arbaa iura ttelfan fellas. Nitni, s tidep, rran ccwaien d iebiben, war Oebbi. U $ilen nitni, war ccekk, pwanhan
A tarwa n Adem! Ccebeet i yal lekni, eccet, esswet, ur siuqqutet. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara wid isiuqquten

Ini: "anwa i igedlen ccbaea n Oebbi, id Issuffe$ i imdanen iS, akked ooeeq ilhan"? Ini: "ayagi, di tmeddurt n ddunit, i wid iumnen. I nitni kan ass n tnekra". Akka ay Nfeuuel issekniyen i ugdud issnen
Ini: "Mass iw Igdel kan ayen n dir, d uvhio ne$ d uffir, abekkav, tem$weo war ssebba, a pcarkem i Oebbi ayen iwumi ur d irs udabu, a ppinim $ef Oebbi ayen ur tessinem
Yal lois isaa lajel. Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ur t swexxioen s ssaaa, ur t id eeaean
A tarwa n Adem! Ma usan kwen id imazanen segwen, mmalen awen issekniyen iW, wid ipeezziben, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ur ppagwaden, ur $weblen
Wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, u sme$woen iman nnsen fellasen, widak d at tmes, nitni degs ad wekkoen

Anwa idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ne$ iskaddben issekniyen iS? Widak, a ten ieaz umur i sen iuran di Tezmamt. Alamma, mi ten id usan imceggaen nne£, ad ddmen leowae nnsen, ad inin: "anida ten wid u$uo tepnujum, war Oebbi"? A d inin: "ur ten nufi". Ad cehhden, $ef yiman nnsen, ar nitni llan d ijehliyen

Inna: "kecmet di tmes ar leoyus n leonun akked yimdanen, i kwen id izwaren"! Yal tikelt ara ikcem lois, ad ixzu gma s. Alamma, mi mlalen degs akw, ad yini uneggaru nnsen $ef umezwaru nnsen: "a Mass nne$! Wigi telfen a$, Aaqeb iten s tmes, berdayen". Inna: "i yal yiwen berdayen, maca ur teeoim ara
Inna umezwaru nnsen i uneggaru nnsen: "ur kwen smenyafen i nekwni, ihi jeoobet aaaqeb, ilmend n wayen tkeppbem
Ih, wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, u sme$woen iman nnsen fellasen, ur asen tellin tibbura igenni, ur kecmen Loennet, skud ur iaadda ara ul$em di tii n tsegnit. Akka ay Nepqeiii ibe$wviyen
I nitni ameioee di Loahennama, ad $ummen s tmes. Akka ay Nepqeiii imednas
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan - ur Nepkellif i umdan siwa ayen iwumi izmer - widak, d at Loennet, nitni, degs, ad wekkoen

A Nekkes i d igwran n dd$el, deg idmaren nnsen. Isaffen ad ppazzalen ddawat sen. Ad inin: "ccekoan i Oebbi i $ Inhan $eo waya. Ur nepwanhu, lemmer ur a$ Inha ara Oebbi. Ni$ usan d imazanen n Mass nne$, s tidep". Ad pwanecden: "appan Loennet, tweotem p, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
At Loennet ad siwlen i at tmes: "ni$ nufa i $ Iaahed Mass nne$, s tidep. Ma tufam ayen i wen Iaahed Mass nnwen, s tidep"? A inin: "Ih". Iberree uberrae garasen: "xezzu n Oebbi i imednas
wid iiieooifen seg ubrid n Oebbi, ssaramen t d uawij, u nekoen laxeot
Garasen ssteo. £ef iqacucen, irgazen, ssnen ten akw, ar uuiffat nnsen. Ad siwlen i at Loennet: "tifrat fellawen"! Ur p keccmen, xas ssarmen
Mi zzint wallen nnsen ar at tmes, ad inin: "a Mass nne$! Ur a$ Ppara s agdud imednas
Ad siwlen at iqacucen i irgazen, ssnen ten ar uuiffat nnsen. Ad inin: "acu i wen d issuli wayen tjemaam akked wayen tzuxxem
Day wigi d wid i$ef teggulem, ar ur sen ippak Oebbi aeunu? "Kecmet Loennet, ur teppagwadem, ur t$weblem
At tmes ad siwlen i at Loennet: "smiret ed fellane$ aman, ne$ seg wayen is ikwen I$at Oebbi". Ad inin: "Oebbi, s tidep, Igdel iten i ijehliyen
wid irran ddin nnsen d zzhu, d urar, u t$uoo iten tmeddurt n ddunit". Ihi, assa, a ten Neppu, akken ppun timlilit n wass nnsen agi, u nekoen issekniyen nne£
Ni$ Nusa ten id s Tezmamt, Nfeuuel ip s tussna. D nnhaya, d aeunu i ugdud iumnen

Day la poaoun kan veoou s? Ass n tisin n veoou s, ad inin wid illan, iu$ leal, ppun p: "ni$ usan d imazanen n Mass nne$, s tidep. Day nesaa imcafaen ara $ icafaen, ne$ ad a$ rren, a nexdem ayen mgirrden wayen nxeddem"? Ni$ sxeuoen iman nnsen. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen

S tidep, Mass nnwen d Oebbi. Ixelq ed tamurt akked igenwan di sdis wussan, sinna, Iaannec $ef usgeld. Ip$ummu iv s wass, ip$awalen $uoes. Iiij, aggur, akked yitran unzen i lameo iS. Day macci ineS lxelq akked lameo? D Asaadi Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Naaret Mass nnwen, s wannuz, di tbavnit. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara wid izegren tilas
Ur ssefsadet di tmurt deffir useeoet is. Naaoet eP, s tugwdi d usirem. Aeunu n Oebbi, s tidep, ar tama n lauuam

D Neppa id Ippaznen avu, d abecceo s ueunu S. Alamma, ma ibbub ed asigna aeayan, Nenheo it ar tmurt immuten. Nesse$li d syis aman. Nessuffe$ ed yissen yal ppemoa. Akka ay d Nessuffu$ lmeggtin, amendeo ma d tesmektim
Di tmurt laali, teff$en d im$an is, ma Irad Oebbi. Di tin icemten, teff$en d kan d iweqweqen. Akka ay Nepbeggin issekniyen i ugdud isnemmiren
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi war Neppa. Nek ugade$ fellawen aaaqeb, ass ameqwoaean
Nnan imvebboen n ugdud is: "$uone$, s tidep, aql ak di ttelfan n uuee
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Ur illi dgi ttelfan. Maca nek d amazan s$uo Mass imavalen
Bbwi$ awen d tibratin n Mass iw, a kwen neuee$. Ssne$, s$uo Oebbi, ayen ur tessinem
Day twehmem mi kwen id iusa usmekti s$uo Mass nnwen, ibbwi t id urgaz segwen, iwakken a kwen inabi, iwakken a peezzbem, amar fellawen aeunu
Skaddben t. Nsellek it, akked wid illan yides, di lbabuo. Ne$meq wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Nitni, s tidep, d agdud ader$al
Ar Aad, gmat sen Hud. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi, war Neppa. Day ur tepeezziben ara
Nnan imvebboen, wid ijehlen seg ugdud is: "s tidep, $uone$, deg k tisselbi; $uone$, ih, kecc seg wid iskiddiben
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Ur dgi tisselbi. Maca nek d amazan s$uo Mass imavalen
Bbwi$ awen d tibratin n Mass iw. Nek, i kunwi, d aneuuae muman

Day twehmem mi kwen id iusa usmekti s$uo Mass nnwen, ibbwi t id urgaz segwen, iwakken a kwen inabi. Mmektit ed mi kwen Irra d igensas, deffir ugdud n Nue. Isem$weo aias lqedd nnwen. Mmektit ed lxio n Oebbi, amar a prebeem
Nnan: "day a$ d tusiv, iwakken a naabed Oebbi Yiwen, a neoo ayen llan aabden imezwura nne$? Awi ya$ d ayen is la $ tessagwadev, ma d tidep ay tessawalev

Inna: "ni$ iwwet ikwen id ddell akked zzaaf s$uo Mass nnwen. Day ad iyi namren $ef ismawen i tefkam, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen, i wid iwumi ur d Issers Oebbi kra udabu. Ihi, gganit, nek yidwen seg wid ara igganin
Nsellek it, akked wid illan yides, s ueunu s$uone£. Nessenger wid iskaddben issekniyen nne£, ur nelli d lmumnin

£uo Tamud, gmat sen Ualie. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi war Neppa. Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen s$uo Mass nnwen. Tal$wemt agi n Oebbi, d assekni i kunwi. Ooet ep a ppecc di tmurt n Oebbi. Ur p iiuoout, mulac a kwen ieaz uaaqeb aqeoean
Mmektit ed mi kwen Irra d igensas, deffir Aad. Isseqaad ikwen di tmurt, tepparram lebouj di swaeel, teqqazem ixxamen deg durar. Ihi, mmektit ed lxio n Oebbi, ur ssexsaoet tamurt, s usefsed
Imvebboen seg ugdud is, wid isme$awoen iman nnsen, nnan i wuohifen, wid segsen iumnen: "day teeoam ar UuUalie d amazan s$uo Mass is"? Nnan: "ih, numen s wayen is id ippuceggaa
Nnan imzuxiyen: "nekwni, s tidep, nenkeo ayen is tumnem
Eerrfen avao n tel$wemt, gelzen lameo n Mass nnsen. Nnan: "a Ualie, awi ya$ d ayen is la $ tessagwadev, ma d amazan ay telliv
Tewwet iten zzenzla, gwran d, deg ixxamen nnsen, d loeppat
Iwexxeo asen, u inna: "a yagdud iw! Ni$ ssawve$ awen d taboap n Mass iw, neuee$ kwen, maca ur teemmlem ara win ineueen
I Lui, mi inna i ugdud is: "day a txeddmem laao ur ixdim yiwen, uqbel nnwen, deg imavalen
Ih, kunwi tpeddum ar irgazen, tcehwam ten, war tilawin. Kunwi, ih, d agdud izegren tilas
Tiririt n ugdud is siwa nnan: "ssuff$et pen si temdint nnwen, nitni d imdanen issaramen tezdeg
Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, siwa tameiiut is, teqqim akked wid igwran
Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur…Wali amek tevoa d ibe$wviyen

£uo Madian, gmat sen Cuaayeb. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi! Ur tesaim oebbi war Neppa. Ni$ iusa kwen id ubeggen s$uo Mass nnwen. Ktilet, weznet, s lewqama. Ur iiuoout medden di cci nnsen, ur ssefsadet di tmurt, deffir useeoet is. I kunwi yif it wayagi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ur p$imit di yal abrid, tessagwadem u tessefoa$em seg ubrid n Oebbi, wid iumnen yiS. Teb$am t d uawij. Mmektit ed mi tellam d takwemmict, Iketteo ikwen. Walit amek tevoa taggara ifessaden
Ma illa iumen urbaa segwen s wayen is id ppuceggaa$, arbaa nniven ur iumin ara. Ueboet ard Ieudd Oebbi garane$. Neppa Yif akw imeaddan
